resources.string: Tap the coin to randomly get either the copper side (heads) or the silver side (tails). Credit for the awesome coin animation goes to Clint Bellanger for Liberated Pixel Art.
Count things by clicking the Add and/or Subtract buttons. Your count is saved even after you close the app. Press the Clear button to start at 0.
Add any number of things to a list and press the Choose! button to randomly select a choice from the list. Tap any entry in the list to delete it.
Tap the dice to roll them. You can choose from 6, 12 or 20 sided dice.

Enter the text you want to encrypt or decrypt in the text box, choose a number from the selector on the left and press either button. Cipher uses a Caesar shift algorithm for the encryption so if you\'d like to decrypt messages, use the same key that was used to encrypt it. Copy your secret message and share!
Choose a number from 1-25 to encrypt or decrypt the message.
